overview: After the Bears catch the Feeling Flu, all their usual feelings are switched -- until Harmony leads them to a cure. Then it's Share Bear to the rescue when twin sisters need help with their friendship issues, and when Funshine is overcome by fears, Grumpy inspires him by bringing happiness to a boy in need. Open up your heart and journey to Care-a-Lot for this celebration of caring and sharing! 3 Episodes - Feeling Flu, Share Squared, More Fun with Grumpy
title: Care Bears: Share Your Care
